eegdash.dataset.DS005662
========================

A high-quality EEG dataset for studying visual touch perception (OpenNeuro ``ds005662``). Access recordings and metadata through EEGDash.

.. rst-class:: sd-badges

:bdg-light:`Modality: eeg` :bdg-light:`Tasks: 1` :bdg-light:`License: CC0` :bdg-light:`Subjects: 80` :bdg-light:`Recordings: 80` :bdg-light:`Source: openneuro`

-------------------

   * - Dataset ID
     - ``DS005662``
   * - Title
     - A high-quality EEG dataset for studying visual touch perception
   * - Year
     - Unknown
   * - Authors
     - Sophie Smit, Almudena Ramírez-Haro, Manuel Varlet, Denise Moerel, Genevieve L. Quek, Tijl Grootswagers
   * - License
     - CC0
   * - Citation / DOI
     - `doi:10.18112/openneuro.ds005662.v2.0.0 <https://doi.org/10.18112/openneuro.ds005662.v2.0.0>`__
   * - Source links
     - `OpenNeuro <https://openneuro.org/datasets/ds005662>`__ | `NeMAR <https://nemar.org/dataexplorer/detail?dataset_id=ds005662>`__

Quickstart
----------

**Install**

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install eegdash

**Load a recording**

.. code-block:: python

   from eegdash.dataset import DS005662

   dataset = DS005662(cache_dir="./data")
   recording = dataset[0]
   raw = recording.load()

**Filter/query**

.. tab-set::

   .. tab-item:: Basic

      .. code-block:: python

         dataset = DS005662(cache_dir="./data", subject="01")

   .. tab-item:: Advanced

      .. code-block:: python

         dataset = DS005662(
             cache_dir="./data",
             query={"subject": {"$in": ["01", "02"]}},
         )
